ModMetaData.name: Operation - Lend Lease
ModMetaData.author: Nikolas Makarov
ModMetaData.description:
Bring the iron heartbeat of eastern European small arms to your frontier.
This mod is totally balance and tested by my colonist.
Sound files and projectile textures in this mod are not included as our intellectual property. Will be removed if requested by the original author.
The rest of visual assets, including textures, models, and any other graphical elements, are the intellectual property of Â© 2026 Crimson Corps. and are protected under copyright law. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of these assets is strictly prohibited.
